programme.title: Boston busing crisis, 1974
programme.short_synopsis: The violent protests against W Arthur Garrity Jr's forced busing in South Boston.
programme.medium_synopsis: How Judge W Arthur Garrity Jr's enforced busing policy, attempting to desegregate schooling, came up against its greatest challenge in South Boston.
